name: Darth Mauled Pomegranate Cider

ingredients.item: Mulling spice, in a mulling ball or tea bag (such as Urban Accents mulling spice blend)

preparation:
In a small saucepan, add the juice, cider and spice.
Cook on medium heat and let the mixture simmer for 10 minutes until fragrant. Remove the mulling bag.
Pour into a mug, and add 1 shot of 
 or 
 per drink.
